values: The Path to Social and Political transformation

Pastor Jeffery explores what we might expect – and what we should expect – on the political landscape in the coming months and years, with the help of some leading figures from the late Greg Bahnsen, Gary North, Rousas Rushdoony, Peter Leithart, Kenneth Gentry, and others active in Reformed political theology in recent decades.
